response.overview: "Morisika" is a captivating short film that delves into the mystical concept of mirages, where loved ones can suddenly transform into illusions without warning. The story follows individuals who are haunted by the possibility of losing their beloved companions to the ephemeral nature of these mirages. As they navigate this unpredictable world, they are forced to confront their deepest fears and insecurities, questioning the authenticity of their relationships and the fragility of human connection. Through stunning visuals and poignant storytelling, "Morisika" explores themes of loss, grief, and the transient nature of love, leaving viewers with a haunting reminder of the impermanence of life and the power of memory.
response.tagline: "Have yoi seen that kite, i wana fly too"
response.title: Morisika
